TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1370-1371
TEI.2.document_title: Bartlett Simms to Stephen F. Austin, 07-10-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Bartlett Sims to Austin, July 10, 1826. Applying for certain land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1370-1371

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Bartlett Sims to Austin, July 10, 1826. Applying for certain land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Peach Creek*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-10-1826"> July 10th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Coln Austin*/person_mentioned* */p* *p*Dear Sir My Helth is Such that I cant come to see you my Self at Present and I send *person_mentioned*Mr. Whiteside*/person_mentioned* and wishing very much to make a Exchang of one labour of Land with you I am all moast a fraid to name the spot But the fact is it is the *location_mentioned*Buckner Spring place*/location_mentioned* I never Have under stud How you prised that place But if you will part from it at all send me word upon what terms I will give you Boot and if that cant Be got let me have the place at *location_mentioned*Jacsons oald Camp*/location_mentioned* which lays*location_mentioned* a bove the Labour*/location_mentioned* that you Let *person_mentioned*Mr Castleman*/person_mentioned* have and if you Cant Let me Have either Let me have one in the *location_mentioned*loar end of Jacksons prarai Beginning on the N E Corner of *person_mentioned*Kinchalaws [Kincheloe's]*/person_mentioned* Land*/location_mentioned* if you can spar the first choice I wold Reather But if not Leave it to my chois of the To Latter places and if you wont let me have Either Recommend me to some good Poast oak that I Can Climb with a Rope to H------*person_mentioned*Coln*/person_mentioned* if you spar any of this land please to Designate in writing what way you wish it taken as I may not Have to improve.*/p* *p* *person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Bartlett Sims*/person_mentioned**/person_mentioned* */p* */div1*
